title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.13 - Mechanical breakdown insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.13 - Mechanical breakdown insurance

State Regulations
A motor vehicle or aircraft mechanical breakdown insurance policy, issued by an insurer licensed pursuant to section
1113 (a)(19)
of the Insurance Law, shall not be considered to be a service contract and shall not be subject to article 79 of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
390.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
